title: Name change possible because everybody thinks I'm french?
body:
Hello,

i get asked so often if I would be french or people write to me in french so I have to Google what they said to me, then answer. 

None of them believes I'm not french. 

Before you ask: I don't have a clue why I named my account a  french name (it's even grammatically wrong) ...

So, would it be possible to change my name?
I guess Riot may think that I would only like to change my name to something cooler or stuff, but I could also only change it from "Cestlemoi" in "it'sme". Just that my name isn't french anymore, but the name's quintessence would be kept.


Thanks in advance & as always excuse any grammar mistakes, I'm as little english as I am french ^^

replies.body:
Unfortunately, we don't offer free name changes. As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, you can purchase a name change in the store. This can be accessed from the **Account** button on the upper right side of the store. Below is a screenshot to assist you:

(Click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/ntXVz

Let me know if you have any questions.
You should be able to buy a Summoner Name Change in the store for either 13900 IP or 1300 RP. Because you can freely purchase it, I highly doubt you will get a free name change.
